content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'El año pasado':
Selecciona la traducción para 'Hace dos días':

content.stimulus_en: I (go) ________ to Paris last year.
She (never/see) ________ him.
How many movies ________ you seen so far?
She (not/see) ________ him yesterday.
They (move) ________ here in 2005.
I (be) ________ to Paris three times.
She has never called me in her life.
How times many have you been to the cinema this month?
She didn't call me yesterday morning.
I been have to Italy several times.
They moved to London two years ago.
I to went Rome last summer.
